name: Critic Report
description: Structured critique report with comprehensive feedback

structure.aiPrompt: Generate metadata JSON for this critique: domain={domain}, focus={focus}, audience={audience}, personality={personality}
Provide a concise overview (under 280 chars) of your critique of this {domain} content: {content}
Summarize what you understood (under 280 chars) from this {domain} content: {content}
List 3-10 critical points (max 70 chars each) about this {domain} content: {content}
List 3-10 positive points (max 70 chars each) about this {domain} content: {content}
List 3-10 questions (max 70 chars each) that need clarification about this {domain} content: {content}
Provide 3-10 final remarks (max 70 chars each) with recommendations for this {domain} content: {content}
